title: Hour 1 - (06-03-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - (06-03-20)
description:
Dan talks about the options it will take to bring the NBA back this season. The NBA finals could now be in October. Dan says he is ready to have the NFL, MLB the NHL and the NBA all at the same time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
